texCoord.description: The set index of texture's TEXCOORD attribute used for texture coordinate mapping.
texCoord.gltf_detailedDescription: This integer value is used to construct a string in the format `TEXCOORD_<set index>` which is a reference to a key in mesh.primitives.attributes (e.g. A value of `0` corresponds to `TEXCOORD_0`). Mesh must have corresponding texture coordinate attributes for the material to be applicable to it.
